author: Andrew Phang Boon Leong JA (delivering the grounds of decision of the court):
casename: Quek Kheng Leong Nicky and Another v Teo Beng Ngoh and Others and Another Appeal
coram: Chan Sek Keong CJ; Andrew Phang Boon Leong JA; V K Rajah JA
counsel: Murugaiyan Sivakumar Vivekanandan (Madhavan Partnership) for the appellants; Ling Daw Hoang Philip (Wong Tan & Molly Lim LLC) and Fan Kin Ning (David Ong & Partners) for the respondents
tags-parsed: Evidence/Admissibility of evidence/"Without prejudice" communications/Negotiations on "without prejudice" basis to delay payment/Whether "without prejudice" communications should be admitted to prove existence and terms of concluded compromise agreement/Whether terms of agreement varied by "without prejudice" communications
